name: Chesker
description:
Chesker is a chess engine, with pieces from other board games. I plan to expand the game to include more games but at the moment it includes:

  • Chess
  • Checkers

Future games that are 100% coming include:

  • some sort of battle ship type thing
  • Shogi
  • Turncoat eventually
Important

you can press the blank button in the menu to enable an AI to play against.
